entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Explain why triggers aren't working after adding the following migration #33691
  • Support `HasConversion` to primitive collection types #33688
    Backlog
  • Cosmos: removing a value from an owned collection leaves the change tracker in a bad state #33687
    Backlog

Closed

  • TimeOnly.FromDateTime() could not be translated in EF Core 8 #33678
    9.0.0
  • Boolean property with default '1' not working #33683
  • Correct approach to one DBContext, multiple versions of the same Database. #33690

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #33678 - TimeOnly.FromDateTime() could not be translated in EF Core 8 #33689

Updated

  • Fix to #33547 - Breaking Change in 8.0.4: System.InvalidOperationException: The data is NULL at ordinal 0. This method can't be called on NULL values. Check using IsDBNull before calling. #33559
